welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Cleckheaton, a charming town in the heart of the United Kingdom. Known for its rich history and friendly locals, we invite you to explore our beautiful city and experience all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport serves as a hub for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linton-On-Ouse Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Linton-On-Ouse Airport is responsible for handling all freight and mail shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
